text: Jerzy Józef Trela (14 March 1942 – 15 May 2022) was a Polish actor. In 2003 he starred in the movie An Ancient Tale: When the Sun Was a God. He was also known for Three Colours: White (1994), Quo Vadis (2001) and Ida (2013). Trela was born in Leńcze, General Government. Trela died on 15 May 2022 in Kraków, Poland at the age of 80.Jerzy Trela nie żyje.
